title: OPPO Reno5 Pro 5G (Astral Blue, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Earphones, USB Cable, Charger, SIM Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Safety Guide
product_specification.Other Display Features: Screen to Body Ratio: 92.10%, 60/90Hz Refresh Rate
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 64MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP Rear Camera Setup, Camera Specifications: Main Camera 64MP (Aperture: f/1.7, FOV 81 Degree, 6P Lens, AF Supported, Closed-loop Focus Motor), Ultra-wide Angle 8MP (Aperture: f/2.2, FOV 115 Degree, 5P Lens, FF), Macro 2MP (Aperture: f/2.4, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, FF), Black and White Camera 2MP (Aperture: f/2.4, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, FF), Sensor Specifications: Main camera 64MP: OV OV64B, 1/2 Inch, 0.7 um, 4:3, Ultra-wide Angle 8MP: Sony IMX319, 1/3.13 Inch, 1.4 um, 4:3, Macro 2MP: OV OV02B10, 1/5 Inch, 1.75 um, 4:3, Black and White Camera 2MP: GC GC02M1B, 1/5 Inch, 1.75 um, 4:3)
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: Front Camera: 32MP (Aperture: f/2.4, FOV: 81 Degree, Lens: 5P, FF, 4:3 Aspect Ratio, Sony IMX615 Sensor)
product_specification.Sensors: Geomagnetic Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Optical Sensor, Accelerometer, Gravity Sensor, Gyroscope, Pedometer
product_specification.Other Features: Memory Frequency: 1866 MHz, OTG Storage Formats: FAT32, NTFS, exFAT, 2TB Maximum OTG Storage Supported, Supports Network Share via Bluetooth, Supports Face Recognition, Fingerprint Unlock Time: 279 ms (When the Screen is On), 398 ms (When the Screen is Off), Face Unlock Time: 457 ms (When the Screen is On), 548 ms (When the Screen is Off), Bluetooth Audio Specifications: SBC, AAC, aptX, aptX HD, LDAC, Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax), Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac), 2 x 2 MIMO, 2.4G/5G Dual Band Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi Frequency: 2.4 GHz, 5.1 GHz, 5.5 GHz, 5.8 GHz, Maximum of 10 Devices Can be Connected to Hotspot
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, APE, AMR, WAV, MID, OGG, FLAC, WMA
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Impressive Camera System: The impressive primary camera system of the OPPO Reno5 Pro 5G helps you click high-quality photos and lets you experiment with your photography skills. It has a 64 MP main camera, 8 MP ultra wide-angle camera, 2 MP macro camera, and 2 MP mono camera.
product_description.AI Highlight Video: This smartphone comes with the OPPO Full Dimension Fusion Portrait Video System to let you capture crystal-clear and bright videos even when you are in dimly lit environments or shooting with backlit settings.
product_description.5G Speed: This smartphone is equipped with MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ chip to let you experience 5G network speed.
product_description.65W SuperVOOC 2.0: You can enjoy up to four hours of video playback with just about five minutes of charging. This smartphone comes with a 4350 mAh battery that charges to 100% in about 30 minutes of charging. Also, it has a Super Power Saving Mode that lets you chat on WhatsApp for more than one and a half hours with just 5% battery life.
product_description.3D Borderless Sense Screen: The borderless design of this smartphone offers an infinite visual experience. Furthermore, the streamlined design is smooth to hold, and the curved edges offer a slim profile to this personal device.
product_description.90 Hz Refresh Rate: The refresh rate of 90 Hz, along with a sampling rate of up to 180 Hz, offers a smooth scrolling experience with instant response. Furthermore, the 16.6 cm Super AMOLED screen, 92.1% Screen-to-body Ratio, 20:9 Aspect Ratio, and 100% DCI-P3, among other features, offer an immersive and distraction-free visual experience.
product_description.Netflix and Amazon Prime Video: This smartphone comes with Netflix HD certifications and Amazon Prime Video HD & HDR certifications to let you enjoy shows in high-quality.
product_description.Dolby Atmos: Enjoy a truly immersive, surround-sound aural experience with this OPPO smartphone.
product_description.Slim and Lightweight Smartphone: This is a slim smartphone with about 7.6-mm of thickness. Also, it weighs about 173 g. So, you can conveniently carry it with you.
product_description.OPPO Reno Glow: For an improved shining effect, this device goes through the repeated process of an etching technology. Thus, you get a stunning smartphone to flaunt.

review:
Awesome phone..... Just go for it...

It's a allrounder phone
Camera - above avarage
display - one of the best curve display looks premium
Look - ultra slim light weight back side feels like velvet finish
performance - superb
Speaker- very good
Fingerprint reliable and fast
Battery long Lasting and
Heating issue not at all
Blazing fast charging speed a half an hour full charge
Colour os is good I was using oxigen os
No lag in gaming tried faug

It's a value for money who wants all the features in a mobile phone..
Oppo is becoming OnePlus Killer...

I've used Oppo F7 and Reno 10X pro. Reno 5 pro is in between them.
Cons:
Photo quality is not up to the mark, or up to the hype (especially sharpness is not there)
Phone really heats up - you can really feel it when you watch videos, more during camera app. I've not played games, I'm pretty much sure it will be hot like an iron box.
Battery power drains fast (7nm processor, amoled screen, 4350mah battery, but drains faster)
Curved display is not that profound, vry minimal curved area (people won't even notice that this is a curved display)
960 fps slow motion flickers a lot.
Pros:
Good display, lite weight, thin, super fast charging.
Color OS is good
Pre order offers (complete protection, buy back guarantee, bank offer, etc) makes trying this phone worth.
AI video and photo is worthy most times, but spoils the scene sometimes.
People who are upgrading from oppo A/ F series or Realme/Redmi note series may like this phone.
After using this phone I started loving my Reno 10X zoom phone more than ever (esp...the camera).

Pros

1- Awesome Display with 90hz refresh rate
2-It took barely 30mins from 0-100 to full the battery
3-Camera looks decent
4-Performance management is good
5- Very sleek and lightweight
6- Signal reception and download speed is good
7- lot of customizable options

Cons

1- The battery discharge is little fast compare to my past phone Poco f1
2-Selfie is not up to the mark at this price range(ok ok)

#Clear call quality. Could not find call recording feature though. Have to rely on 3rd party apps for the same

# slim like oppo k1 and Lightweight...Very unique given the heavy phones all around nowadays.

#Black color one seems classy though many seem to prefer blue.

# good performance...better than Snapdragon 855 mobiles....daily activities are a breeze...Moderate gaming too. is smooth Asphalt 8...cannot comment on other heavy games

# Battery - Drains only on heavy (continuous) usage...morning to night usage should be easily possible...blazing fast charging though. 50 to 100% charge in 10 mins

#camera - some shots come out really well....some are better on my one plus 7t pro...night mode reno wins hands down though + few additional gimmicks for those interested in the phone due to camera capability...

Light weight with premium performance, fast charging and camera...If this your criteria too then just go for it...Very few mobiles tick all the above criteria...most premium mobiles in this range lack in either weight or camera department. A better battery performance would have made it a perfect phone.

RECIEVED TODAY WITH GOOD PACKING .
IT WAS BEAUTIFUL IN SO MANY WAYS, LET ME TELL U SOME....

PROS::
1) FIRST MOBILE WICH HAVE DIMENSITY 1000+ 5G SOC - GIVES GOOD PERFORMANCE IN THIS SEGEMENT.

2) MAINLY DISPLAY STUNNING 3D CURVE EDGE TO EDGE PANNEL VIVID IN SUNLIGHT CONDITIONS ND WICH COMES WITH 90HZ REFRESH RATE AND 180HZ TOUCH SAMPLING RATE ADDED WITH OIES VISION AND OPPO SENSE FEELS BUTTERY SMOOTH.

3) CAMERA QUAD SETUP GIVES EXTRA GLPSE WITH ADDING OPPO AI SOFTWARE WAS STUNNING & MONOCHROME LENS AND DUAL VIEW MODE IS GOOD.

4) 65 WATT VOOC CHARGE WICH MAKES 4350MAH 100% IN 30 MIN.


5) COMPACT DESIGN IN HAND FEEL WAS GOOD, LIGHT WEIGHT FEELS SO COMFORT.


CONS ::

1) NO STEREO SPEAKERS, REST OF ALL WAS GOOD .

The OPPO Reno5 Pro may quite possibly the most exquisite-looking phone in its price range. The MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ chipset adds a significant performance boost, The cameras are a work of art and the charging speeds are ridiculously fast.
If you crave a premium-ness in design, combined with reasonably high-level performance and stunning photos and videos, the Reno5 Pro is the perfect option.
This phone is so beautiful looking and performance is super fast. I am very happy to have this phone in my hand.

* Super VOOC Charge
* Light weight
* Premium design at this price
* Camera is also superb

Cons:

* Due to Google dial app search of contact is also not good from call logs and contact....

Was super excited for this device after seeing specs and YouTube unboxing videos. But received my device today , excitement somewhere smoked up in Air .

So here is a little reviews about the device

Screen - Super Amazing amolled display , 90hz work like a charm, back cover provided do provide curved glass experience.

Build quality - Black is my favourite colour so ordered the same , black colour shines a lot prone to fingerprints , must used back cover if going for black cover . One thing i like most is , it is super slim and lightweight.

Camera - Thats what pinched me a lot , camera app full of bugs , oppo must provide a patch at the earliest , if your are person who loves to capture photos this phone is not for you.

Battery:- charging is super duper fast loved it , battery drain is quick

Operating system- lots of preinstalled apps , although performance is good but yes need patch for camera


Sharing some images of mobile with cover , without cover and some camera samples

Awesome device, Nice Camera in the segment, Fastest 7nm Chipset, A great Display. Very fast charging only 26 min 1 to 100%. It's really Value for money. Only need to improve the battery. Avarage 1 day battery 🔋 backup.

Fabulous! Amazing! Mind Blowing!! Are few expression to describe this phone. I gifted this phone to my wife and she is loving it every minute.

Design: Flawless and top notch design by Oppo for the this Phone. The phone size, curved screen and camera setup competes the best flagship phones like Samsung and Apple in the market.

Display: Full HD Display gives crystal clear images. The screen refresh rate is so high, enjoying the fast scrolling and switching between apps.

Camera: My wife was a Samsung S series user and she did not had high expectations with any phone except Apple, but this Camera is outstanding. Every click comes out like a professional photograph which can easily put best DSLR cameras to shame. I'll attach few pictures to speak by itself. The selfie camera glows the phone screen to bring out bright photos even in the darkeat place.

Battery: It has a decent battery backup, and the charging is super fast. It charges the entire phone in 30 minutes flat.

We'll add more points after using it for few more days. For now, best phone ever. Simply go for it.

10/10 : Full points to the makers.

All those preorder deals made phone a best bang for buck!

Phone advertised for its camera and video capabilities. But its not worth that hype.

Best part of the phone is build quality! Hands down the best feeling device in Hand for me.

And the next best thing is display! Bright and vibrant!

Battery is solid for a day for my kind of usage!

And all those preorder deals makes ownership cost of this mobile for a year is zero rupees.

Slim design, curved edges with awesome display makes it look very premium.

Charging is really quick 100% in 30min. In hand feel is very good due to less weight and sleek design.
Earphone is additional surprise since most of the brands have stopped giving it.

This one is the best phone in terms of design

Quite nice

The phone loos really premium and instantly catches the eye.
The battery backup is good. Charging superfast, and all other specs are simply amazing.

The effective price for 1 year is too good to be true.

Go for it.

Getting a flagship for the price of a feature phone.

Review after 3 days:

Display: It's simply superb. Fully and appropriately bright and fluid like butter.

Battery: Lasts a day and a half for normal usage.
Charging speed is simply amazing. I plug it in before doing my chores and in 30 mins, it's done. This is a superb feature to hve in a phone these days when life is so fast.

Camera: Great quality pictures at every light situation.

The size is appropriate to be handled and has a velvety finish to it.

Go for it without a thought.

Early review
I was one of the first customers who pre ordered this phone. Thanks Flipkart for one day early delivery. This is my take on one day of use. Will update later.

1.first thing u will notice is the lightness of the phone
2.charging is super fast. But I have noticed moderate heating of screen and back while charging
3.few preinsallted apps are there. We can remove most. But Netflix is not removable
4.screen is good. 120Hz would have been better for this prize.
5.fingerprint sensor underdisplay is fairly accurate. But it takes slightly longer time.
6.screen protection film is pre applied.
7.they have also included a transparent back cover

Update 1: Battery life is average. Drains little faster. But can easily last a day with moderate use.
2. There is no option to select default home screen. Also no widgets of wifi, Bluetooth,etc for easy access (only can be accessed in notification drawer). Wonder y such basic and simple features are omitted.

This is a honest review after using the phone for over 2 weeks :
I bought this phone on a pre-order basis that included HDFC bank discount of Rs.3,500 and exchange value for my Asus Zenfone 5Z for 5,750 (although I later chose to keep my Asus phone because it was too good to part and paid the exchange value in cash). Alsp as part of the Pre order I got Complete Mobile protection at Re.1 and exchange the phone with 3-12 months for ~ Rs.26,000 at Re1 and finally 5,000 Flipkart Super coins . All this made the deal really very attractive.

Now coming to the mobile review:
Pros:
1. Mobile is sleek and light weight (just 173g) and that way it is the best in this range
2. Look and feel is great especially the curved edges. Screen display is good
3. Best charging capability. So far it has been able to charge the mobile from sub 10% to 100% in less than 30 minutes. This is just awesome.
4. Dimensity 1000+ processor is good. For a normal mobile users this is more than sufficient
5. Photo camera is average while the Video camera is really good
6. Mobile volume is average
7. Signal reception is good
8. UI is good but I preferred to have POCO launcher to enhance the usability

Cons:
1. Fingerprint Reader - This sensor is slow in response even when the screen is On. When the screen is Off it stutters further. I think this can be fixed via a software update to some extent
2. Battery life seems to have an issue; I'm not a gamer and don't play any games. I use the phone only for news, media content and a bit of camera. I consider myself an average user. That way i expect the phone to live up to 1.5 days but it barely reaches a day's mark and kind of dies down even if the usage extends a little bit
3. Quad camera is ok , but they must have provided a telephoto camera at this cost. Photo camera quality is average
4. Call recording - Most people are saying they don't see call recording in the app . Not sure why but this is available for sure. But the big let down is when recording a call you hear a recorded message saying that the call is being recorded that is audible to both the parties. Looks like this is a compliance feature in some countries but definitely not in India. As none of the other phones have this compliance. This is a big let down. Don't think even any third party app can fix this as i have tried out a few but none addresses this. Please Oppo remove this audio message.
5. Contacts and Dialer UI Integration is not good, please rework this UI for a better usability
6. Community - Oppo Community Support looks non-existent. There are so many posts without a response. My post in Oppo Community on 29th is yet to be responded. Even their LOV for devices does not list Oppo Reno 5 PRO 5G, It has only up to Oppo Reno 4. I have seen Xiaomi and Realme responding to queries in their community support well within a day even with a large volume of posts.
7. Lag - Minor UI lag is there when you have 3-4 apps running and forget Snapdragon 865 you cannot even compare this to Snapdragon 855.
8. Price - Considering the device at its current list price of Rs.36,000, it definitely is much costlier

I love the Design of the phone, no doubt.
Performance wise it's pretty decent, good for an average user who doesnt really play games and is into day to say social media apps.
Camera- The AI tech. is pretty funky but most of those AI shots in portrait is pretty cringy, I wont lie. Not something I would upload on Social Media.
The pictures do well with noise reduction at night, but mostly natural colours are lost.
In normal light conditions, pictures have a very high contrast. Again, ruins the natural portrait shots.
Never use this camera if you have used an iPhone for sure xD
Battery- I usually keep it on 60Hz, because of the battery drain. It still drains faster than my 3000MaH battery phone. Either Oppo lied about the 4000 MaH battery, or the Mediatech processor is really bad with Battery efficiency.
One could say if i charge it for 15 mins, it could last me half a day at least. You are definitely right. But considering my profession when im at my OPD, i dont have the time, also the 65W Charger is pretty bulky. Not really portable I would day. So definitely keep this in mind if you can charge it for like 15 mins in between, sure its not bad.
Display is pretty good. But at this price point you can get an older model of a high end phone with a 4k display. Practically, i barely used 4k, so this doesn't really matter much to me. At least the material is AMOLED so it wont disappoint.
Finger print- Decent, have seen faster under the display ones.
Overall, i think this phone is pretty decent. I dont think the camera would be any better than the OnePlus 8T. Maybe somewhat equal in terms of the picture quality.
Definitely a must buy if youre into new Tech. If youre into photography amd have used the iphone, then definitely you shouldn't go for this phone.
Price point is a fine. Could have been lower in my opinion. At least i got buy back so maybe I'll get another phone in the coming months or next year.

Hi guys a very honest review of the phone if you are wanting to go for an premium phone...

Unboxing

When I unboxed it it felt like wow the packing is real good and when took out the phone , I think they could have worked on the phone more than the packing.

Found lots of unuseful cardboard , a BIG 65 W Charger , a grade D charging cable and a -D grade ear phones.

About the phone

The phone looks average but when you start the phone the real things start , the phone has excellent features , display but feels a bit heavy to handle. Plus pont is it's not bulky at all so the weight would not bother you in that case.
Unlike other phones , it's non slippery and easy to handle. Blue colour looks excellent.

Refresh rate is very good at 60hz also and you won't get watery eyes while using this phone for long , so you can watch your best OTT series at a stretch.

Battery 🔋:

Here Oppo must have done more , with that kind of weight they could have easily given this a 5000 MAH + pack, the power plant is just not justified for this product , as I am not playing any games on this phone but the B
attery needs a charge twice a day even if you have selected this to 60 hz.

Charging :

7 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 12 -15 mins and you are back again.

Camera

Is Super I must say Super , but Oppo could have done better for their flagship brand Reno , as they do for OnePlus....
There could have been additional benefits for Oppo users , like exclusive club etc...
Besides the packing Oppo could have done a bit better on the Charging Cable , which feels low grade polymer used in it , this would have come with a braided cable or a better Flexi cable. ( We don't ask for wireless charging in this segment)

The phone looks beautiful , but Oppo could have done better with something shown in the back center than keeping their logo on left bottom, the centre looks blank....

A new logo of Reno flagship could have added a new zest to this sweet phone...

Rear Camera is excellent which captures next to life like pictures with the Amoled display but something doesn't seems right like , it promises to do more but that thing is not available in the Camera .The AI recognition does great wonders to close shots but appears to fail on Zoom ,could have done more better with the zoom , the pixels start to blur when you zoom.

Front Camera is good too but the problem is the preset zoom , it tends take pictures too close for a selfie .
While taking a group selfie you have to look for the tallest person to grab to phone so that everyone can fit into the frame.
Yes there could have been more gestures just than a hand ✋ which would have made it a lot easier for selfies to get clicked.

Charging is Super , Display is A1 , but Oppo could have done better with the curve .

All together this maybe the best phone with this price tag , you have some copy cats coming with similar copies of this phone , but let me tell ya , Oppo is Oppo.....
Nice phone in 5g segment .it's curve design is awesome and battery back is too good like 1 time charge u will get 24 HR backup . It's take 30 min to full charge and oppo is my favourite phone

Firstly, do not get deceived by the reviews online. All of them are sponsored.

First Impressions -
This phone is not bad, but at the same time, nothing too fantastic. Definitely not the camera. Yes, there are quite a few quirks. Not flagship-level though.
Any Mediatek Processor is inferior to a Snapdragon. Yes, it does charge very quickly, but it gets warm quite quickly too. Even for a 30 mins normal usage.

The Good-
Decent build quality and lightweight.
The screen. The curved screen is where I got sold. It does live up to the expectations.
Color OS is okay. Nothing to complain.
The Bokeh mode in video shooting is a serious plus for some audience.

The Bad -
The thing that this phone does not stand out on anything else except a good display is a bummer.
Since Flipkart has a buyback guarantee, no qualms. But yes, at 35k+, this is bloody overpriced.
The much-advertised camera is a serious letdown. Yes, it gives you good pictures and video, but my 2-year-old one plus does the same as well.

Will update after a few weeks

After 10 days of normal operation my observations are:
1) On one full charge you can last for 12 hours running easily with heavy use of data and hotspot too. Also it has power saving and ultra power saving mode that can extend your battery below 20 and 10 percent restricting to less features and talk only respectively.

Charging: 5 star to charging. Because it literally charges to 100percent from 5 percent in 30 minutes.

So due to fast charging feature you can ignore battery backup issue for heavy running throughout the day.

2) I felt cheated by Flipkart because it clearly mentioned in feature section about dedicated memory slot which is not here and it is 128gb internal storage device so in future when u load more apps and with memory getting full due to large size videos and photos u may have to start transferring ur files to external storage.

3) Camera is good...not worth of 36k phone. On first sight the hullabaloo around its camera seems not that worth. Especially, the night mode for which they advertised (keeping in mind the 32500 for which I paid for it).

4) for gaming it is good as heating can be ignored, not of considerable amount.

But my only regret is that with 32500 phone they should either increase internal memory or give memory card slot

pros.16.6 cm Super AMOLED display: Awesome display with 90hz refresh rate offers a smooth experience and instant touch response.
pros.Performance: The MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ octa core processor gives a super fast performance.
pros.Design: The OPPO Reno5 Pro sports a flawless and top notch design with curved edges which gives it a premium look.
pros.4350 mAh Battery: The battery backup is good enough for normal daily use. Super fast charging with 65W charger ensures the battery is up within an hour.

cons.Camera: The camera quality is just decent enough. Night photos and video clarity is average.

summary.verdict: The OPPO Reno5 Pro 5G comes with loads of awesome features and is a great buy for anyone.
summary.Additional Information: OLED display, weighs 173 gms, Supports 4g sim.
